Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/14th
ShortDescription: 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Roosevelt, Ashland and 18th due to street blockage near Halsted/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Roosevelt, Ashland and 18th due to street blockage near Halsted/14th.

Allow extra travel time.
